meanings.definition: Able to be shown or exhibited.
meanings.sent1: The painting was displayable at the art gallery.
meanings.sent2: The new sculpture is very displayable in the museum.
meanings.sent3: The cat thought the shiny ball was displayable enough to play with.
meanings.sent4: Her talent for storytelling is truly displayable in her captivating novels.
meanings.sent5: The fireworks show was so displayable that it left everyone in awe.

meanings.sent1: The graph is very displayable on the presentation slide.
meanings.sent2: The infographic is a perfect example of something displayable.
meanings.sent3: The colorful flowers were so displayable that they seemed to dance in the wind.
meanings.sent4: His emotions were so raw and displayable on his face.
meanings.sent5: The sunset was incredibly displayable, painting the sky with vibrant colors.

meanings.sent1: The antique vase is very displayable in the living room.
meanings.sent2: The jewelry collection is highly displayable in the store window.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous puppy found the shoes to be very displayable chew toys.
meanings.sent4: Her collection of seashells is so displayable, it brings a beach vibe to the room.
meanings.sent5: The historical artifacts were incredibly displayable in the museum exhibit.
